headline.print_headline: It's Jeter's Last, Puig's First All-Star Game
headline.main: It's Jeter's Last, Puig's First All-Star Game

docs.snippet: Derek Jeter will be making his 14th and final All-Star appearance, while dynamic Yasiel Puig makes his Midsummer Classic debut on Tuesday in the contest where home field advantage in the World Series goes to the winning league....
docs.lead_paragraph: Derek Jeter will be making his 14th and final All-Star appearance, while dynamic Yasiel Puig makes his Midsummer Classic debut on Tuesday in the contest where home field advantage in the World Series goes to the winning league.

headline.print_headline: First Black Woman to Win Olympic Gold Dies in Ga.
headline.main: First Black Woman to Win Olympic Gold Dies in Ga.

docs.snippet: The first black woman to win an Olympic gold medal, Alice Coachman Davis, died early Monday in south Georgia. She was 90....
docs.lead_paragraph: The first black woman to win an Olympic gold medal, Alice Coachman Davis, died early Monday in south Georgia. She was 90.

docs.snippet: The basketball barnstormer who owned the Washington Generals and other teams that lost thousands of games to the Harlem Globetrotters has died. Louis "Red" Klotz was 93....
docs.lead_paragraph: The basketball barnstormer who owned the Washington Generals and other teams that lost thousands of games to the Harlem Globetrotters has died. Louis "Red" Klotz was 93.

docs.snippet: Somalia has posted an ambassador to the United States for the first time in more than 20 years....
docs.lead_paragraph: Somalia has posted an ambassador to the United States for the first time in more than 20 years.

headline.print_headline: Museum in Mississippi Offers Laughter, Surprises
headline.main: Museum in Mississippi Offers Laughter, Surprises

docs.snippet: Within a few steps of the Mississippi Children's Museum, there are squeals of laughter and excitement....
docs.lead_paragraph: Within a few steps of the Mississippi Children's Museum, there are squeals of laughter and excitement.

headline.sub: M&A Monday means a good day for stocks.
headline.main: M&A Monday means a good day for stocks.

docs.snippet: A wave of mergers and deals, along with better-than-expected Citigroup results, help to lift stocks. Bobbi Rebell reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: A wave of mergers and deals, along with better-than-expected Citigroup results, help to lift stocks. Bobbi Rebell reports.

headline.print_headline: Online Campaign Raises Nearly $300,000 for Texas Shooting Survivor
headline.main: Online Campaign Raises Nearly $300,000 for Texas Shooting Survivor

docs.snippet: An online campaign has raised nearly $300,000 for Cassidy Stay, the teenage survivor of a shooting attack in suburban Houston last week in which her parents and four siblings were killed....
docs.lead_paragraph: An online campaign has raised nearly $300,000 for Cassidy Stay, the teenage survivor of a shooting attack in suburban Houston last week in which her parents and four siblings were killed.

headline.main: A Photographic Muse Beyond the Ruins

docs.snippet: Not content to tell the typical tale of a down-and-out town, William Widmer allowed Pine Bluff, Ark., to change his photojournalism....
docs.lead_paragraph: Not content to tell the typical tale of a down-and-out town, William Widmer allowed Pine Bluff, Ark., to change his photojournalism.

headline.print_headline: Manager of New Jersey Diner Pleads Guilty in Murder for Hire Plot
headline.main: Manager of New Jersey Diner Pleads Guilty in Murder for Hire Plot

docs.snippet: A former manager of the Tick Tock Diner in Clifton, New Jersey, pleaded guilty on Monday to hiring a hit man to murder his uncle, who co-owns the popular eatery, prosecutors said....
docs.lead_paragraph: A former manager of the Tick Tock Diner in Clifton, New Jersey, pleaded guilty on Monday to hiring a hit man to murder his uncle, who co-owns the popular eatery, prosecutors said.

headline.print_headline: Bolivia's President to Seek Third Term to Expand Social Reforms
headline.main: Bolivia's President to Seek Third Term to Expand Social Reforms

docs.snippet: Bolivia's President Evo Morales will run for re-election in October to press on with his promise of expanding social reforms in the Andean nation, the vice president of the ruling party said on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Bolivia's President Evo Morales will run for re-election in October to press on with his promise of expanding social reforms in the Andean nation, the vice president of the ruling party said on Monday.
